lyrics.stanza: Forth from God's glorious temple Bursts a great torrent divine, A mighty flood through its entrance Unto its boundary line.
God's living water Brings the refreshing supply Death has been swallowed completely In the abundance of life.
Everything works to God's glory As unobstructed it flows; Then, of the utmost importance, All on the altar must go.
Water of life, overflowing, Now is a great rushing tide. Man can no longer act freely; By grace alone we abide.
